vote.text: Amendment SA 1458, under the order of 4/21/21, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 51. Record Vote Number: 164.

action.text: Amendment SA 1458 proposed by Senator Blackburn to Amendment SA 1445. (consideration: CR S2147; text: CR S2140) To improve the bill.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1458, under the order of 4/21/21, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 51. Record Vote Number: 164.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1458, under the order of 4/21/21, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 51. Record Vote Number: 164.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1458 proposed by Senator Blackburn to Amendment SA 1445.
